message: Today I'm gonna share with you a very precious secret that will help Web designer and Developers writing less code and use their time more efficiently. What i'm sharing is Zen Coding which you write small command and it generate for you a huge bunch of code. for Windows users they can use it with Sublime text 2 and Mac users it works on every single good IDE such as Text Mate, Sublime, etc... http://code.google.com/p/zen-coding/wiki/SublimeTextZenCodingEn Mohamed Yosry, Aboulroom .. Mahmoud Abd El-Fattah, Mohamed El Sayed

data.message: It's my secret weapon :D ad7ak 3ala el nas ana ezzay delwa2ty :P
& windows user can use it with Aptana, Komodo Edit, Notepad++ even DW
now Sublime Text 2 is available for Windows :)
Mohamed Alaa yeah i know & it my main editor already. Just wanted to let Windows users that they have other options too :)

AMAAAAAAAAZING ya Alaa :D
how come I didn't know about it all this time?
bas begad, thank you ya pop for this very useful sharing :D
